title: RPG Princess Voice Pack
description: The RPG Princess Voice Pack by Marvelous Spiral Studios is perfect for RPGs or ARPGs. Includes “color quips” that you can play along with full lines to give the feel of the text. Our Princess is cute and adorable, but also scrappy and can fight!
longDescription:
This RPG Princess Voice Pack by Marvelous Spiral Studios contains:

 

·        140 regular lines, with two different reads of each

·        23 efforts including hitting, being hit, jumping, and dying

·        11 color quips to represent emotions like happy, sad, confused, and angry

·        10 longer full lines (two reads each) to flush out the Princess character

·        A total of 337 wav files in the Princess voice

 

Perfect for RPGs or ARPGs. Includes “color quips” that you can play along with full lines to give the feel of the text. Our Princess is cute and adorable, but also scrappy and can fight! Check out the sample below.

 

Listen to a sample of RPG Princess at Soundcloud

Check the list of all the different lines in this document.

 

Marvelous Spiral Studios produces voiceover for games including casting, directing, recording, and localization. To learn more go to www.marvelousspiralstudios.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

Number of Audio Waves: 387

Number of Audio Cues: 387

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 8 min 39 sec

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows and Mac
